scripts.build: preact build --no-prerender --dest docs && git add docs
scripts.ghpages: npm run -s build && git add . && cross-env-shell git commit -m "$npm_package_version" && git push && cross-env-shell hub release create -m Version "$npm_package_version" "$npm_package_version" && cross-env-shell sentry-cli releases set-commits "$npm_package_version" --auto && cross-env-shell sentry-cli releases deploys new "$npm_package_version" --env production -n "gh-pages $npm_package_version"
